Verify the 'Submit' button is visible, enabled, has background color rgb(0,123,255), foreground color #FFFFFF, font size 16px, font weight 500, border radius 4px, padding 12px 24px, border 1px solid #007bff, width 120px, height 48px
Verify the 'Submit' button on hover transitions background color to rgb(0,100,200) over 200ms and opacity becomes 0.9
Check the 'Username' input field is visible, enabled, has placeholder text 'Enter your username', border 1px solid #CCCCCC, width 300px, height 40px, text content left aligned, and its value is empty
Verify the 'Username' input field when focused changes border to 2px solid #007bff, has aria-label 'Username input', and background color #F5F5F5

Confirm the main product image loads within 500ms, has source 'product_hero.jpg', rendered dimensions 600x450px, natural dimensions 1200x900px, alt text 'Premium product image', is centered horizontally at x 300, opacity 1.0, no watermark, and loaded successfully
Ensure the 'About Us' navigation link is visible, has text 'About Us', text color #333333, text size 14px, font family 'Arial', font weight 400, located at x 500, y 20, and has padding 10px 15px
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link becomes active with background color #EEEEEE upon selection within 100ms
Verify the video player is visible, width 800px, height 450px, initially muted, source 'promo_video.mp4', and top position is 100px
Click the 'Fullscreen' button
Verify the video player transitions to fullscreen mode within 300ms, maintaining aspect ratio 16:9, with playback controls visible

Confirm the 'Confirm Deletion' modal dialog appears with opacity 1 within 300ms, has background color #FFFFFF, width 400px, height 250px, is vertically and horizontally centered, has border radius 8px, border 2px solid #DDDDDD, top position 200px and left 300px on 1024px wide viewport

Check the error message 'Invalid credentials.' is visible, has text color #FF0000, font size 14px, font weight 600, positioned 5px below the input field at x 50, has padding 8px 10px, background color #FFEEED, total height 30px, and border 1px solid #FFCCCC

Verify the shopping cart icon displays a count of '3' items, is positioned at x 950, y 15, has width 32px, height 32px, aria-label 'Shopping Cart with 3 items', foreground color #000000 for the icon, and the count badge has background color #FF0000, text color #FFFFFF, and border radius 50%

Ensure each product list item is visible, has margin-bottom 20px, total width 250px, background color #FDFDFD, contains product name 'Luxury Watch' with font weight 700, font size 16px, and a price displaying '25.99' with color #B12704

Confirm the pagination control is visible, the 'Next' button is enabled, the 'Previous' button is disabled, the current page number '3' is selected with background #007bff and text color #FFFFFF, each page button has padding 5px 10px, the entire control is centered, and has total count of 5 pages

Verify the 'Sort by' dropdown menu, when opened, displays 4 options, each with font size 14px, padding 8px 10px, text color #333333, background color #FFFFFF, and the 'Price: Low to High' option has label 'Price: Low to High', becomes focused on tab, with height 36px per option
Check the header bar is visible, has background color #FFFFFF, height 60px, top 0, left 0, right 0, bottom border 1px solid #E0E0E0, and its content is vertically aligned center
Verify the header bar when scrolling down remains sticky at the top, scroll-top 0, and opacity is 1.0

Ensure the footer copyright text 'Â© 2023 Company Name' is visible, font size 12px, text color #666666, text align center, positioned at the bottom of the viewport with padding 20px, has background color #F8F8F8, its width matches the viewport width, and has top border 1px solid #E0E0E0
Verify the 'Remember me' checkbox is visible, initially not selected, has associated label 'Remember me' with font size 14px and text color #333333, and its left position is 10px

Verify the 'Remember me' checkbox when selected has value 'true', its shape changes from an empty square to a filled square with a checkmark, background color changes to #007bff and has 2px solid #0056b3 border
Confirm the date picker input field has placeholder 'Select a date', value '2023-10-26', width 150px, height 36px, and border 1px solid #CCCCCC

Confirm the date picker input field when opened displays the current month with '26' October focused, current date cell has 2px solid #007bff border and background color #E6F3FF, and the year displayed is 2023
Check the thumbnail gallery displays 5 images, each with rendered dimensions 100x75px, border 1px solid #DDDDDD, margin right 10px, and all images are loaded
Check the currently active thumbnail has border 2px solid #007bff, opacity 1.0, background color #F0F8FF, and other thumbnails have 0.7 opacity with no background
Verify the progress bar is visible, width 100%, height 8px, background color #E0E0E0, and the filled portion indicates 75% progress with color #28A745 and border radius 4px
Verify the label 'Loading...' is hidden until progress starts, then visible with font size 12px and text color #333333, and the progress value is 75

Ensure the tooltip 'Click to edit' appears visible with opacity 1 within 100ms on hover over an icon, has background color #333333, text color #FFFFFF, font size 12px, padding 5px 8px, border radius 4px, its bottom edge is 5px above the hovered element, width 80px, and height 24px

Confirm the user avatar image has source 'avatar.png', rendered dimensions 40x40px, circular shape with border radius 50%, alt text 'User profile picture', positioned at x 20, y 20, with 1px solid #CCCCCC border, load time under 100ms, and background color #F0F0F0 before loading
Verify the 'Menu' button is visible, enabled, has width 48px, height 48px, background color #F8F9FA, text color #333333, font size 16px, aria-label 'Main menu toggle', and padding 10px
